mapper.select: select lm_num,lm_gameMode,lm_tier,lm_summonerName,lm_myPosition,lm_findPosition,lm_memo,lm_date,lm_end,lm_winrate from lolmateList where lm_gameMate=#{lm_gameMate} and lm_gameMode=#{lm_gameMode} order by lm_num desc;

select lm_num,lm_gameMode,lm_tier,lm_summonerName,lm_myPosition,lm_findPosition,lm_memo,lm_date,lm_end,lm_winrate from lolmateList where lm_gameMate=#{lm_gameMate} and lm_gameMode=#{lm_gameMode} and lm_findPosition like #{lm_findPosition} order by lm_num desc;

select lm_num,lm_gameMode,lm_tier,lm_summonerName,lm_myPosition,lm_findPosition,lm_memo,lm_date,lm_end,lm_winrate from lolmateList where lm_gameMate=#{lm_gameMate} and lm_gameMode=#{lm_gameMode} and lm_tier like #{lm_tier} order by lm_num desc;
select lm_gameMate,lm_findPosition from lolmateList order by lm_num desc;
